SA01n758:10: caturthe khalu dhyāne bāhyādhyātmikā apakṣālā na vidya[nte tasmānna saṃvartano] utpādyate |
SA01n758:11: prathame hi dhyāne vitarkavicāra vagnikalpāvapakṣālabhūtau vidyete |
SA01n758:14: ityato yasyāṃ dhyānasamāpattau yathābhūto'pakṣālastathābhūtena bāhyena vināśaḥ |
SA01n758:15: caturthe tu [bāhyo'pakṣālo na pravartata iti] nāsti saṃvartanī |
SA01n758:19: kathaṃ punaretāḥ saṃvartanyaḥ kayā vā'nupūrvyā bhavanti ? taducyate |
SA01n758:28: sā tu nityaṃ tejasaḥ saptakapṛṣṭhe vāyusaṃvartanī bhavati |
SA01n758:29: ta ete piṇḍena bhavanti ṣa[ṭpañcāśat] tejaḥsaṃvarta[nyaḥ],
SA01n758:36: evaṃ ca kṛtvā prajñaptibhāṣyamanulomitaṃ bhavati-“catuḥṣaṣṭhiḥkalpāḥ śubhakṛtsnāṃ(tsnā)
SA01n758:43: yathā khalu vātapittaśleṣmabhistribhiḥ sattvānāṃ marmacchedaḥ pṛthivīdhātutvalakṣaṇo bhavati tadvadagni[jala]vāyubhirbhūrūtsādyate |
SA01n758:46: yathā cādhyātmikyastrisraścittasya tayorbhavanti vitarkavicāraprītyucchvāsapraśvāsalakṣaṇaista[thā] bāhyā apyupadravā vahnyambhovāyuprakopalakṣaṇā bhavantīti ||
